title: The Cursed Crusade RePack By R.G Revenants NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
GENERAL INFORMATION:
 Released: 2011
 Genre: Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person
 Developer: Kylotonn Entertainment
 Publisher: Atlus / 1C-SoftKlab
 Publication Type: RePack
 Platform: PC
 Language: English / Russian
 Language voice: Russian / English
 Medicine: DWORD / SKIDROW Steam Emu

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
 Operating system: Windows 8 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows Vista SP2 / Widows XP SP3
 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2 2.0 GHz
 RAM: 2 GB
 Video: 256 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800 Series / ATI Radeon 4870
 Sound Card: DirectX compatible
 Free disk space: 11 GB

DESCRIPTION:
The Cursed Crusade combines the beauty of medieval Europe with exciting adventures and dark fictional story. Events unfolding in the XII century and developed around the two cursed warriors, Denza and Esteban fighting for their damned souls. It is a story of redemption and survival, which breathes life into the secrets and mystical events of the Middle Ages. The protagonists of the project are people like everyone else. They are subject to temptation,
